## üìå About Us

::: {.about-us-box style="background-color: #fff3e0; border-left: 6px solid #fb8c00; padding: 1em; border-radius: 6px;"}
**Donaldson Measurement Partners** is a boutique consulting firm specializing in measurement and evaluation. We help individuals, teams, and organizations strengthen positive functioning and performance through evidence-based assessment and insight. Our team designs and validates psychometric tools and evaluation systems that produce credible, actionable data to drive positive organizational change.
:::
